allPosts.title: Circulation Condition
allPosts.excerpt: The prayer wheel is a musical instrument in Tibetan Buddhism, and each revolution of the wheel represents a chanting of a sutra, a blessing. In the video, the rotation of the wheel is combined with the rotation of the magazine when changing ammunition in a pistol. The two seemingly unrelated events are absurdly linked in Ye Shuhan’s image through the gesture of the spinning hand.

allPosts.title: In my dream, I killed Bi'ru
